snippet.title: Mechabellum - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Mechabellum will be available in Steam Early Access on May 11, 2023. Watch the trailer to see mechs in action in this PvP auto-battler, featuring a wide range of units, mechs, and tactical gameplay. 

In Mechabellum, plan your attack, deploy your troops, survey their battles, and gain intel on your opponent's setup, and counter for victory.
